snippet: Joseph Ross was arrested on Wednesday and charged with helping a longtime Jewish community leader loot more than $7 million from the Metropolitan New York Council on Jewish Poverty.
abstract: Joseph Ross, owner of Long Island insurance company Century Coverage, is arrested and charged with first-degree larceny and money laundering; complaint charges him with assisting longtime Jewish community leader William E Rapfogel loot more than $7 million from Metropolitan New York Council on Jewish Poverty over two decades.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Ross was arrested on Wednesday and charged with helping a longtime Jewish community leader loot more than $7 million from the Metropolitan New York Council on Jewish Poverty.

headline.main: Insurer Charged With Theft From a Charity
headline.print_headline: Insurer Charged With Theft From a Charity

keywords.value: Metropolitan New York Council on Jewish Poverty
